name: balance
description: The amount of ESDT token the address possesses. It includes the number of decimals.

name: balanceNum
description: The amount of ESDT tokens the address possesses, in a numeric format.

name: data

fields.name: hash
fields.description: Arbitrary field that should contain the hash of the NFT metadata.

fields.name: nonEmptyURIs
fields.description: Whether the token has non empty uris.

fields.name: whiteListedStorage
fields.description: Whether the token has whitelisted storage. An NFT/SFT has whitelisted storage if the URI belongs to one of the allowed decentralized storage services, such as IPFS or Pinata.

fields.name: royalties
fields.description: NFT royalties. Numeric value between 0 an 10000 (0 meaning 0% and 10000 meaning 100%).

description: A structure that contains additional information about a token.

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp when the address balance was changed.

name: tokenNonce
description: The sequence number of the token. This field is empty in the case of `FungibleESDT`.

name: type
description: The type of the ESDT token. It can be `FungibleESDT`, `NonFungibleESDT`, `SemiFungibleESDT`, or `MetaESDT`.

name: frozen
description: Whether the tokens in question are 'frozen' for this account.
